data.description: Perl client interface to Irate service
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Most interfaces to miscellaneous network services seem to have
    their own namespace under Net (Net::IRC etc).

    Irate (irate.sf.net) exchanges XML documents over HTTP-like
    connections. Irate is a music-recommendation service covering freely
    downloadable music from sources like artists.iuma.com,
    files.mp3.com.au, and various open content licenses.

    This is a client-only module.
